aiCelebration21Day.one:
### Congratulations! üéâ

You've maintained the habit **{habitNames}** for 21 consecutive days! This is a crucial milestone in making an action automatic. Keep up the great work!

aiCelebration66Day.one:

aiOptionGeneralDesc: A holistic view of your entire habit journey.
aiOptionMonthlyDesc: An in-depth analysis of the last 30 days.
aiOptionWeeklyDesc: A Stoic reflection on the last 7 days.
aiSystemInstruction: You are a Stoic Sage, a habit mentor who values consistency over perfection and focus on what we can control (our actions). Your response MUST be in {languageName}. Use markdown. Legend: ‚úÖ=Completed, ‚ö™Ô∏è=Pending, ‚û°Ô∏è=Snoozed.
chartEmptyState: Keep tracking your habits to see your progress here.
confirmEndHabit: Are you sure you want to end the habit "{habitName}" starting from {date}? It will no longer appear on this or any future dates.
confirmGraduateHabit: Congratulations on consolidating the habit {habitName}! Do you want to 'graduate' it, removing it from your daily list to focus on new challenges?
confirmHabitMove: You moved {habitName} from {oldTime} to {newTime}. Apply this change for today only, or from now on?
confirmInvalidKeyBody: The entered key does not appear to be a valid UUID. Sync keys typically have a format like '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'. Do you want to continue anyway?
confirmNewHabitPastDate: You are creating the habit {habitName} to start on the past date of {date}. This may affect your historical data and streaks. Is this correct?
confirmPermanentDelete: This will permanently delete the habit '{habitName}' and all its history. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?
confirmRemoveTime: Remove "{habitName}" from the {time} schedule from {date} onwards? The habit will remain active at other times.
confirmResetApp: This will permanently delete ALL your habits and progress data. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?
confirmScheduleChange: You've changed the schedule for {habitName}. This change will apply from {date} onwards. Your past records will be preserved. Continue?
confirmSyncDisable: Are you sure you want to disable sync? You will no longer be able to access your data on other devices and new data will not be saved to the cloud.
confirmSyncOverwrite: The data in the cloud is different from your local data. Do you want to overwrite your local data with the cloud data?
dragToAddHabit: Drag a habit to this time slot.
modalManageNotificationsStaticDesc: Receive reminders to complete your habits. Click below to allow notifications.
modalNotesTextareaPlaceholder: Enter your note about this habit for the selected day...
noticeDuplicateHabitWithName: A habit with this name already exists.
noticeNameCannotBeEmpty: The habit name cannot be empty.
noticeSelectAtLeastOneTime: Please select at least one time of day.
notificationStatusDisabled: Notifications are blocked. You need to change the permissions in your browser settings.
syncActiveDesc: Cloud sync is active on this device.
syncInactiveDesc: Save your data to the cloud to access it on any device.
syncWarning: WRITE THIS KEY DOWN! It is the only way to access your data on other devices. If you lose it, your cloud data will be lost forever.
